races.title: I AM MISSING THE TORONTO HALF AND THE NIGHT RUN JUST DID AND TERRY FOX RUN
races.description: Should also just confirm with Bibs what exaclty i am missing if anything.

races.title: 2025 - Go nuts for Donuts
races.description: Run is NYC with my cousin Saif. Ran the entire Goveners Island, was pretty cool!

races.title: 2025 - The Sunburn Solstice
races.description: Yeah not sure what compeled me to do this but it was a wild experience. Something about having only one task for the day and repeating it for 15 hours.

races.title: 2024 - Niagara Falls Marathon
races.description: First full marathon. Crazy experience, I don't think I could ever describe what it felt like to do something for that long.

races.title: 2024 - Brita Ultra Night Run
races.description: Did the 10k alone as my friends only signed up for the 5. lame.

races.title: 2024 - Under Armour 10K
races.description: Was pacing Elvin who wanted to hit 57 minutes for the ten.

races.title: 2024 - Around the Bay
races.description: Working towards marathon prep, this was a test. Funny story the race was supposed to be only 30km but construction increased it to 34km. Then the morning of there was a sinkhole that added another km.

races.title: 2023 - Michelob Ultra Night Run
races.description: Was a fun event last time so I figured why not. This time I dragged along my cousin Saif.

races.title: 2023 - Niagara Ultra
races.description: Had gotten pretty lazy between the last race and this one. The only reason I did this is because my friend Elvin couldn't make it and forcefully transfered the bib to me.

races.title: 2022 - Niagara Falls Half Marathon
races.description: Completed the Niagara Falls Half Marathon. First big boy race ever. Little did I know of the story to follow.

races.title: 2022 - Michelob Ultra Night Run
races.description: First race ever. Shout out to my friend Jacob for hyping me up here and on pretty much every other event.
